headline: Intense competition hurts paint companies' profitability; more pain in the offing
intro: Demand for decorative paints is likely to remain muted in H1FY26, owing to an earlier-than-expected monsoon. If demand fails to improve in the second half of FY26, another round of de-rating could ensue.
imagecaption: Asian Paints Ltd led the decline in the sector's profitability. Image: Pixabay

headline: Grasim Industries Q4 Results: Net loss narrows to  ?288 crore, revenue up 32% YoY; Dividend declared
intro: Grasim Industries Q4 Results: Operating performance lagged expectations. EBITDA came in at  ?221 crore, down 58.1% from  ?527 crore last year.
imagecaption: Grasim Industries Q4 Results: Net loss narrows to  ?288 crore, revenue up 32% YoY

headline: BEL, Titan to Maruti ? These 5 Nifty 50 stocks near 1-year highs after recent stock market rally. Do you own?
intro: Grasim Industries is nearly at its 52-week high, trading at  ?2,738. The recent market surge, influenced by geopolitical developments and trade agreements, has lifted investor sentiment, with several stocks nearing their highs. Institutional activity remains low despite the rally.
imagecaption: BEL, Titan to Maruti ? These 5 Nifty 50 stocks near 1-year highs after recent stock market rally. Do you own?

headline: Hindalco repositions itself as a solutions company in hope of richer valuations
intro: Hindalco wants to reposition itself as a provider of customized products to its customers. The rebranding is an effort by the company to achieve a better valuation that is usually rewarded by the public markets to consumer-facing companies.
imagecaption: Aditya Birla Group chair Kumar Mangalam Birla
